## ğŸŸ  Section 10 â€” Tectonic Activity

<table>
<tr>
<td align="center" width="50%">

### 10a Â· Tectonic IAT Map
![Tectonic IAT](10a_tectonic_IAT_map.png)

**Index of Active Tectonics (IAT):**
- SB1 = Class 2 â€” High
- **SB2 = Class 1 â€” Very High** âš ï¸
- SB3 = Class 4 â€” Low

*El Hamdouni et al. (2008) classification*

</td>
<td align="center" width="50%">

**âš ï¸ Engineering Implication**

SB2's Class 1 tectonic rating means:
- Slope failure risk is elevated
- Avoid large dam structures in SB2
- Use distributed small check dams (<3 m height)
- Monitor for slope instability after heavy rainfall events

*â†’ [Tectonic methodology](../../docs/methodology/)*

</td>
</tr>
</table>
